item.title: Fly.io
item.description: I spent some time over the weekend understanding Fly.io. It’s always fascinating to me how many smart people are building really neat solutions. Fly.io is subtly different to other platforms that I use (Kubernetes, GCP, DO, Linode) and I’ve found the Fly.io team to be highly responsive and helpful to my noob questions. One of the team’s posts, Docker without Docker surfaced in my Feedly feed (hackernews) and it piqued my interest.
